blitzEdit.core

Class RotatableElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • blitzEdit.core.Element
      • blitzEdit.core.RotatableElement
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Component

    public abstract class RotatableElement
extends Element
    abstract class for rotatable elements in a circuit
    Author:
    David Schick, Christian Gartner
